summary: Implements the request handling layer for the mock Amazon SES V2 service, translating incoming API calls into backend operations such as contact and contact‑list management and email sending, and constructing the appropriate JSON responses.
business_intent: Provides a test‑double for Amazon Simple Email Service V2 so developers can simulate SES V2 functionality (e.g., managing contacts, sending messages) in unit and integration tests without contacting real AWS services.
